    Node represents a Node in the current

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node[] children() 
      void decreaseCurrentDepth()
      Decreases the current depth for the Node (as in when the Tree is getting truncated), and, if currently on a leaf node which has moved upwards, forces the generation of all the children Nodes.

      Generates all the children of the current Node.

      • Node

        public Node(int[] points,
            Score score,
            Node parent,
            int currentDepth)
        Simple constructor for Node objects.
        Parameters:
        points - the list of points.
        score - the Score object.
        parent - the parent Node object.
        currentDepth - the depth of the Node in the game Tree.

    • Method Detail

      • setCharacters

        public static void setCharacters(java.util.ArrayList<com.vlad.rain.entity.mob.Player> chrt)

      • generateChildren

        public void generateChildren()
        Generates all the children of the current Node.

        A Node's children consist of 4 Nodes, each one representing (when traversed to that particular point), the state of the game at that given Node.

      • setMaxDepth

        public static void setMaxDepth(int depth)

        public Node parent()

        public Node[] children()

      • getCurrentCharacter

        public com.vlad.rain.ai.data.Characters getCurrentCharacter()

      • decreaseCurrentDepth

        public void decreaseCurrentDepth()
        Decreases the current depth for the Node (as in when the Tree is getting truncated), and, if currently on a leaf node which has moved upwards, forces the generation of all the children Nodes.
